DOC.brief_summary: This control study design evaluate efficacy TS-1 survival compare surgery alone . Patients randomly assign receive either surgery alone surgery follow treatment TS-1 within 45 day curative resection ( curability A B ) . To assess efficacy , data recurrence survival collect time enrollment 5 year surgery . To evaluate safety , data adverse event collect time enrollment 1 year surgery .
